title: ICAI Announces Convocation for December 2025
content:
# ICAI Announces Convocation for December 2025

Ek important update hai for all newly qualified Chartered Accountants! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne December 2025 ke liye Convocation Ceremony announce ki hai. This is a significant event to formally welcome new members into the profession.

Here are the key details:

*   **Convocation Date:** The Convocation Ceremony will be held on **29th December 2025**.
*   **Eligibility:** Members who enrolled as Chartered Accountants during the period from **16th July 2025 to 30th November 2025** are eligible to participate.
*   **Awards:** Eligible members will receive their Certificates of Membership and/or Certificate of Practice (COP).
*   **Felicitation:** Rank Holders of the CA Final Examination held in September 2025 will also be felicitated during the ceremony.
*   **Cities/Centres:** The convocation will be organized across various major cities in India to ensure wide accessibility. These include Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Pune (Western Region); Bengaluru, Chennai, Hyderabad, Ernakulam, Vijayawada (Southern Region); Kolkata (Eastern Region); Ghaziabad, Indore, Jaipur (Central Region); and Chandigarh, Ludhiana, New Delhi (Northern Region).
*   **Further Communication:** Eligible members will receive individual intimation from the M&SS Directorate with specific details regarding the venue, timings, and confirmation of participation. The detailed program will also be hosted on the ICAI website soon.
